attributes.additional_details: If premature babies can be saved from 24 weeks, then why should they be allowed to be aborted at this age? I propose the gestational period be reduced to 12 weeks, after this period, abortions should not be allowed to proceed.

rejection.details: Please see petitions "Abortion(Reform)Bill", "Reduce abortion from 24 weeks to 18 weeks" and "Reconsider the legality of abortion".
